info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 7:12PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weld and northeastern Boulder Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 712 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Berthoud, or 19 miles southwest of Greeley, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Longmont, Erie, Firestone, Johnstown, Frederick, Fort Lupton, Berthoud, Lochbuie, Dacono, Mead, Platteville, and Hudson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
